summary: This mod adds an attractive female vampire follower to skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=DarkVoilet][size=4]Author: LunaXTec[/size][/color][/center] 
[color=DarkVoilet][size=3]Version: 1b[/size][/color]
[color=DarkVoilet][size=3]Category: Companions - Other[/size][/color]

[center]
[color=Red][size=3].------ Changes -- (1b) --------.[/size][/color]

Can now Cure or Vampire Lordify Vilara.



You will not be able to marry Vilara in this version, but it is coming soon. 


I now gave Vilara a younger look and changed her voice to match it, this should fix the 

\"hey skeever-butt\" bug too.





[color=Red][size=3].----- DESCRIPTION -----.[/size][/color]

This mod adds an attractive female vampire follower to skyrim. She can fight for you and 

will level up as the you do.





As a vampire You will find her either in Grave Concoctions during the day or outside Dead 

Mans Drink at night.






[color=Red][size=3].------ Requirements -----------.[/size][/color]

Dawnguard(Don\'t ask for non DG version, I\'m sorry, but I won\'t do it.)



Ponytail Hairstyles by Azar

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31797//?



Latest Skyrim Update



This mod uses simple scripts, as far as I know you won\'t need SKSE.




[color=Red][size=3].------- Backstory ---------.[/size][/color]


Vilara grew up in Ivarstead working at the mill and hunting. One night she was headed home 
after a long day of hunting and got attacked by a vampire. She defeated it, but ended up 
catching sanguine vampiris. It wasn\'t until morning when she noticed some symptoms.



With no way to get cured she left her family in Ivarstead and searched for someone to help 
her adapt to what she was becoming.



She ended up becoming a close friend to Zaria in falkreath. Zaria agreed to help her and in 
return Vilara let her study her vampirism.



Realizing her farm clothes wouldn\'t do her much good, she spent all her septims on a set of 
specialized ebony armor.



A few weeks went by and now Vilara\'s hunger for blood is growing and she refuses to feed. 

She now seeks someone to travel with so she can begin searching for a cure again.




[color=Red][size=3].--------- Stats -------------.[/size][/color]

Level 10 and will level with the player until level 50



Combat/Class of SpellSword



Uses steel sword by default



Has Vampiric drain, frostbite, but will get a few more if given Vampire Lord ability.




[color=Red][size=3].--------- Features --------.[/size][/color]

Vilara can train you in alchemy some.



You can marry Vilara.(Temporarily Removed)



Vilara uses a Variant of Ebony Mail by default.



She has a schedule while not following the player.



Can either cure Vilara or convince her to embrace vampire lifestyle.



Can come through your monitor and kill your foes (Not really)


[color=Red][size=3].----- Known Bugs -------.[/size][/color]
Sometimes Vilara won\'t attack while in Vampire Lord Form, I\'m working on fixing this.



If Vilara\'s dialog doesn\'t appear at first, save then load that save.






[color=Red][size=3].----- Used Tools -------.[/size][/color]
Creation Kit: Downloadable on th steam network.

 




[color=Red][size=3].----- Walkthrough -------.[/size][/color]

To start, find Vilara in Falkreath and say \"Do you need something?\" some straight-
forward dialog should be gone through.



Once done, you can recruit her at anytime.



To start one of her quests use \"About getting cured...\" then  choose \"I heard (?) in 

Morthal might be studyng vampires.\" to start cure quest.


-----------
To start the vampire lord quest, choose  \"About getting cured...\" then \"I think you should 
keep your gift\" know that this requires speechcraft of atleast (?).



The option is still there without it, but she will say \"Are you crazy?\"


-----------


You can cure Vilara by talking to (?) in morthal. He will say he is currently busy and will 

give you a book.



The book will hint at a potion called \"Restore Life Torpar\" located somewhere in (?)



If you find it, you can let Vilara use it. I took this approach to hopefully avoid breaking 
(?)





You can get Vilara the Vampire Lord ability by Convincing her to embrace the Vampire 
lifestyle (Requires you be a vampire/Completed Dawnguard on Volkihar side)



Due to my lack of knowledge of lore, I\'m sorry if this isn\'t realistic.



If you are a Vampire you can give Vilara the power. If you are cured, ask Serana to do it.



You will need to convince Serana though, she doesn\'t just go giving out vampire powers to 
everyone.


[color=Red][size=3].----- F.A.Q. -------.[/size][/color]


[b][color=DarkVoilet]1. Is their a way I can marry/recruit her right away?[/color][/b] 


[b][color=DarkVoilet]-------------------------------------------------------------[/color]

[/b] 


Yes, type (without quotes) \"setstage LXTVILTestngQuest 30\" in the console.
NOTE: \"Testng is not a typo\"


[b][color=DarkVoilet]2. Cheats?[/color][/b] 


[b][color=DarkVoilet]-------------------------------------------------------------[/color]

[/b] 


Type \"Help Vilara\" in the console, find something called \"Book of Vilara\" then use 

\"player.additem itemid 1\" it contains all console cheats for vilara.


[b][color=DarkVoilet]3. This is great, but can you change/add.. etc?[/color][/b] 


[b][color=DarkVoilet]-------------------------------------------------------------[/color]

[/b] 


No. I\'m not trying to be mean, I simply have my own vision for how Vilara should be. If you 

however want to request a mod feel free to, I\'m always looking for ideas.



[/center]
author: LunaXTec
